Class ReaderHDFS

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.heidelberg.cl.ap.ss13.io.ReaderHDFS

  • public class ReaderHDFS
extends java.lang.Object
    A class with different functions to read in files located on the HDFS
    Author:
    Carolin Haas (carhaas1@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • readInTableHDFS

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> readInTableHDFS(java.lang.String directory,
                                                                   int number_reducers,
                                                                   FileSystem fs)
        Reads line-wise from a file in the HDFS containing a translation table
        Parameters:
        directory - the directory where the translation table files are
        number_reducers - the number of reducers, which is equal to the number of files we need to check if they exist
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        Returns:
        a HashMap that holds "e|f" as they key and "double" as the value

      • readIniStateProbHDFS

        public static double[] readIniStateProbHDFS(java.lang.String directory,
                            int number_reducers,
                            FileSystem fs)
        Reads the initial state probability files from the HDFS
        Parameters:
        directory - the input directory of where the initial state probability files are
        number_reducers - the number of reducers, which is equal to the number of files we need to check if they exist
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        Returns:
        double[] that holds the initial probability for each state

      • readTransitionProbHDFS

        public static double[][] readTransitionProbHDFS(java.lang.String directory,
                                int number_reducers,
                                FileSystem fs)
        Reads the transition probability files from the HDFS
        Parameters:
        directory - the input directory of where the transition probability files are
        number_reducers - the number of reducers, which is equal to the number of files we need to check if they exist
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        Returns:
        double[][] matrix that holds the transition probability

      • findNumberOfLinesHDFS

        public static int findNumberOfLinesHDFS(java.lang.String directory,
                        java.lang.String prefix,
                        int number_reducers,
                        FileSystem fs)
        Finds out the number of lines in a list of files sharing a common prefix from the HDFS by iterating through it
        Parameters:
        directory - the input directory of where the input file are
        prefix - the prefix that the files have in common
        number_reducers - the number of reducers, which is equal to the number of files we need to check if they exist
        fs - the hadoop filesystem
        Returns:
        a int that contains the number of lines the files with the common prefix contain
